EmailTemplate.name: Offer letter received
EmailTemplate.subject: Al Rayan Bank property finance application update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Salutation} {!Account.FirstName} {!Account.LastName},
Please find below an update on the progress of your application for property finance from Al Rayan Bank.
Please note that we have received your signed acceptance of our offer letter.
To ensure that your completion is not delayed it is worth checking regularly with your solicitors that all the requirements are in hand and that no issues have arisen.
Should you become aware of any issues which might affect your preferred completion date, please do not hesitate to contact our Sales Support team on 0121 456 7878 or email salessupport@alrayanbank.co.uk, between 9.00am and 5.30pm, Monday to Friday.
Kind regards
Al Rayan Bank
